content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  November 09 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings plans to withdraw the ratings on  Colgate-Palmolive Company on or about Dec. 9  2016  that is approximately 30  days from the date of this release  for commercial reasons. Fitch currently rates Colgate-Palmolive Company as follows:  --Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) 'AA-'; Outlook Stable; --Short-Term IDR 'F1+'; --Senior unsecured revolving credit facility 'AA-';  --Senior unsecured notes
name: Colgate-Palmolive Company
title: Fitch Plans to Withdraw Ratings of Colgate-Palmolive Company

content: FRANKFURT  May 12 German consumer goods company Henkel has agreed to acquire Colgate-Palmolive's  entire range of laundry detergents and pre-wash brands in Australia and New Zealand for 220 million euros ($245.43 million).
name: Colgate-Palmolive Company
title: Henkel to buy Colgate-Palmolive's Australia  NZ laundry brands for 220 mln euros
